frontmatter.heading: Agency Maturity for Agile
frontmatter.promo_description: Use this to evaluate and correlate a requiring activities' organizational maturity in adoption of digital service techniques to the resulting contract action.

frontmatter.heading: Glossary
frontmatter.promo_description: The following is a glossary of terms commonly used for Agile Software Development Services. This is not inclusive of all terms.

frontmatter.heading: Sample Language for Government Contracts for Agile Software Development Services
frontmatter.promo_description: This text is to help illustrate how Agile principles may be applied. It is not intended to set new policy or serve as default contract language.

frontmatter.heading: History of the Tech Far Hub
Examples of Team Members and Roles Needed to Support Agile Software Development
frontmatter.promo_description: Use this to see team members and roles needed for Agile Software Development.

frontmatter.heading: Finding Opportunities and Providing Services to the Federal Government
frontmatter.promo_description: This guide is intended to walk through some of the initial processes required in an effort to reduce the time it takes to bring innovative digital service companies into the government marketplace.

frontmatter.heading: Quick and Dirty Guide to Agile Project Management
frontmatter.promo_description: This summary provides information on the key tenants of agile project management and explains how it can be used to manage digital services projects.

frontmatter.heading: Create an Inspiring Product Vision
frontmatter.promo_description: This field guide is designed to help articulate your agency’s product vision. In order to have an inspiring product vision, project teams must be clear on the problem that they want to solve! Once they are clear they can use the product vision as THE true north to guide the project. It is as the French say, the “raison d’etre” for a project. It is the reason why the entire project exists.

frontmatter.heading: How to use an 8(a) company for your digital service needs
frontmatter.promo_description: The use of SBA’s 8(a) program can reduce pressure on agencies to use digital services by shortening procurement lead times, ease competition requirements, and provide coaching around new implementation methods.

frontmatter.heading: Tech Challenge Playbook
frontmatter.promo_description: Learn to use challenges to assess vendors.
